text: For only Og the king of Basan was left of the Raphain: behold, his bed was a bed of iron; behold, it is in the 3. 11 Or, acropolis, citadel: or extremity of the land of the Ammonites.chief city of the children of Ammon; the length of it is nine cubits, and the breadth of it four cubits, according to the cubit of a man.
